original_text: And I will make every effort to see that after my departure you will always be able to remember these things.
korean_text: 내가 힘써 너희로 하여금 내가 떠난 후에라도 어느 때나 이런 것을 생각나게 하려 하노라

sentences.original_text: And I will make every effort
to see that after my departure
you will always be able to remember
